scripts.dev: bash -lc "PORT=${PORT:-3000}; rm -f .next/dev/lock; for i in 1 2 3 4 5; do PIDS=$(lsof -tiTCP:$PORT -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null || true); if [ -n "$PIDS" ]; then echo "🛑 Cerrando $PORT: $PIDS"; kill -9 $PIDS 2>/dev/null || true; sleep 0.5; else break; fi; done; if lsof -tiTCP:$PORT -sTCP:LISTEN >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "⚠ Port $PORT still busy"; lsof -iTCP:$PORT -sTCP:LISTEN || true; exit 1; fi; PORT=$PORT exec next dev --hostname 0.0.0.0"
